page.title: 01Rhiw Saeson Valley Powys
page.content: This consists of the valley of Rhiw Saeson and its tributaries, and surrounding hills, it is the northern part of Llanrynmair community. It is sparsely populaed and consists mainly of sheep farming though upper parts of the hills are designaaed for forestry but not all planted yet. The sports center (squash,badminton,etc) is an eccentricity,established and run by a couple who moved into a remote farmhouse and used by middle class 'immigrants' from surrounding areas. The area houses a television relay mast which serves this, an adjoining valley communities.
